duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all room reservations aspects for groups and manage group room blocks with the Resort inventory.
Ensure group contractual obligations are met and communicate with Sales Managers, Event Managers, Operational Departments, and Director of Revenue Management regarding group blocks.
Review inventory and forecast for decision making, communicate group activity, and run daily reports.
Assist in the daily leadership of the Reservations department and provide necessary information to other departments about groups.
Comply with company standards for sales and marketing, respond to resort emergencies, and follow the crisis management plan.

education_certification.credential: 1 year previous reservations experience. Bachelor's degree in Hospitality or related field (preferred)
